<<<<<<< HEAD
A paper to Friends, and others, against the pomps of the world, followed and used by many tradesmen in their vocations, contrary unto many of their suerties [sic] promises and vows. Fox, George, 1624-1691.
1 sheet ([1] p.)
Printed by John Bringhurst ..., London : 1682/3 [i.e. 1683]
Signed: London, the 2d. of the 11th month, 1682. G.F. [i.e. George Fox]. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
=======
